Hi hi

I remember a few years ago there was a mod that would help with placement of landing gear, it would have a (X, Y, Z) axis shoot out from the wheels so you could get them all in line. I could have sworn it was called something along the lines of the title, might have had something to do with Firespitter? It was a standalone mod though, but my Google-foo is lacking.

If anyone could point me in its direction, that'd be grand. If it's been updated for 1.5.x, that'd be even grander

The landing gear mod, IIRC, was ALG (Adjustable Landing Gear)... which Shadowmage incorporated into Kerbal Foundries...

Also, the standalone mod, might be Hangar Grid that you are thinking of

It wasn't Hangar Grid but actually, I think it was ALG - I remember a fair few tweakables available in the gear as well (and I've just found it in my 0.90 Gamedata folder) so it's likely that. If it's in KF now though, that's awesome news, I've coincidentally been waiting for the latest update to it for a few days now. Cheers dude!
